name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Around 10:00 on October 26, a 16-year-old girl from Ningxia New Business Technical School was unwell. Her father asked the class teacher for permission to leave school for medical treatment, but the teacher did not give permission. The teacher said that the school had a rule that family members were not allowed to take children to see a doctor, and the school had a school doctor.
At 11:30, the father rushed to the school and put the medicine at the school gate to wait for the child. The child sent a voice message to her father saying that she was scared.
However, half an hour later, the child fell to his death

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The pandemic has killed all the small businesses of the working people for three years, and now they are starting to monopolize the supply and marketing cooperatives and canteens
"Rebuilding the supply and marketing cooperatives will not follow the old path"
"But no one believes it"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The people are not happy

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up to the death of a three-year-old child in Qilihe, Lanzhou
In a WeChat group, there was a person who seemed to be a staff member of the epidemic prevention and control staff "clarified" the so-called truth in the group. The authenticity of the clarification can be judged by yourself after reading it.
But in the recording, the staff member blindly pushed the responsibility to the father who was secretly doing business, which I think is not advisable
Because the essence of this kind of thing is still that the government has never made emergency plans for other diseases

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: the second part

content:

The victims were mainly domestic mobile phone users

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Enlightenment is just to make others stand up for you." I am shocked that some people understand this matter in this way.
In fact, enlightenment is so that when you stand up, others will stand up for you.
Hong Kong people do not need enlightenment because they only returned to China in 1997.
It is precisely because Hong Kong people are different from mainlanders that the compromise solution of "one country, two systems" was proposed. Of course, the bankruptcy of "one country, two systems" and the powerlessness of the people under totalitarianism are another topic that needs more space.
1/3

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Similarly, you cannot deny that most Hong Kong people stood up together in 2019 - and therefore, even today, in the face of the constant suppression of the totalitarian regime, they have not completely fallen into the one country, one system like the mainland.
Yes, in terms of the results, millions of Hong Kong people taking to the streets could not achieve their demands, so does that mean that Hong Kong people are doing useless work? 2/3

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Can we think again, if we had supported them like the Hong Kong people supported us in 1989, would this situation have turned around?
So is it that awakening is useless, or that there are too few people awakening?
The point you put forward still does not provide a solution, and still does not answer the question of whether China will immediately get better if the Communist Party falls.
Because you actually don’t know. 3/3

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: One more thing to add, why is it that my point of view is that the current problems in China can no longer be solved as simply as the fall of the Communist Party, but some people interpret it as "the Communist Party has no problems, but the Chinese have problems"? It may be because these people themselves are what they call "Chinese people who have not changed their nature". They usually only put the blame on the Communist Party, but when it comes to nationality, they think others are saying bad things about them. This is "Chinese people don't know themselves".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @jajia sprayed

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@TommyAndTim thinks being long-winded means you can't understand complex texts.
So what is your point of view?
Overthrow the Communist Party? Then do you want to return to China to overthrow the Communist Party? Otherwise, won't you become the person who instigates others all day long?
Do you think all Chinese are Chinese? Then you seem to be quite angry when talking about nationality.
So what is your demand? Just to watch the fun and not mind the big deal? Then how can you have the nerve to say that others can only talk nonsense?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the wholesale market of District 9, Sartu District, Daqing City, Heilongjiang Province, all businesses have resumed work except the wholesale market. Those merchants can only fight guerrilla warfare in the cold wind to sell vegetables. It's miserable.
Today we gathered to ask for an explanation, but as expected, this is the explanation.
It's not much different from the military parade at Xiaoxihu Lake in Lanzhou. Douyin's video location is not Daqing and can't be seen at all.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Hello, Mr. Li, I want to submit an article. This is what happened in my school in July. Now I don’t feel afraid anymore. Thank you, Mr. Li.
It’s amazing. An academy very cleverly reflects the administrative screws who put the responsibility on the citizens, the muddy and silent administrators, the chicken thieves who help the villains to clean up the ground, the idiots who are just brainless but speak politely, and the good people who can’t stand it.
